ThingDef.label: custom ppsh-41 submachine gun
ThingDef.description: A Soviet submachine gun that was modified by an unknown outlander, giving it better range, more burst shots, and better damage than a regular heavy smg would.\n\nIts custom origin can be differentiated based on the amount of cloth wrapped-up in the gun itself, acting as makeshift duct tape.

ThingDef.label: custom remington 870
ThingDef.description: A custom pump shotgun that was modified by an unknown outlander. The shotgun almost never miss in medium range, can inflict better damage, and has a chance to stun an enemy in every shot.\n\nIts custom origin can be differentiated based on the amount of cloth wrapped-up in the gun itself, acting as makeshift duct tape.

ThingDef.label: custom hunting rifle
ThingDef.description: A custom bolt action sniper rifle that was modified by an unknown outlander. Despite its crude design, this sniper rifle offers bonus to hunting stealth and great accuracy, making it the perfect weapon for hunting big games.\n\nIts custom origin can be differentiated based on the amount of cloth wrapped-up in the gun itself, acting as makeshift duct tape..

ThingDef.label: MG-42 "incendiary"
ThingDef.description: An incendiary version of the standard mg-42, which uses AP incendiary rounds. Using plasteel as a material for the gun barrel, the gun is immune to over-heating which allows for continuous firing, although it requires an amount of finesse to accurately use this gun.

ThingDef.label: Lahti L-39 "incendiary"
ThingDef.description: An incendiary version of the Lahti L-39 anti- material, which uses AP incendiary rounds. This gun hits the hardest among the other incendiary weapons, thanks to its frame made of plasteel, the gun wont be destroyed due to the immense recoil.

ThingDef.label: Sturmgewehr 44 "incendiary"
ThingDef.description: An incendiary version of the standard sturmgewehr 44, which uses AP incendiary rounds. This gun is somewhat light-weight and very compact which offers ease of use during deployment, and just like the MG-42, its barrel is reinforced in plasteel for continous automatic fire in medium range.

ThingDef.label: heavy flamer
ThingDef.description: A long-ranged heavy flamer. This weapon is capable of spreading fire in a very wide area, plunging an entire area in a sea of inferno. Very effective in taking down necronoid structures in a safe distance.\n\nThis weapon only has a limited number of 500 shots before the weapon becomes un-usable.

ThingDef.label: cleansing boltgun
ThingDef.description: One of the most effective anti-neconoid firearm developed by the brilliant minds of the glitterworld mechanists. This bolter fires bolter rounds which is filled with ANB "Anti Necronoid Biomass" nanites, where once inside a necronoid, it'll run rampant and destroy necronoid cells, dealing heavy amounts of damage to a necronoid entity while deals normal damage to normal living beings.\n\nSuch a weapon was developed after experiencing countless deaths and losses, where humanity finally reached a breakthrough in pushing back the necronoid army.

ThingDef.label: imperial cleansing boltgun
ThingDef.description: A special cleansing bolter designed for imperial use. Unlike the original, this weapon receives better modifications, giving it extented bolter magazine and reinforced gun barrel.

ThingDef.label: imperial cleansing autocannon
ThingDef.description: One of the most effective heavy weapon againsts any necronoid entity. The autocannon uses a special 20mm AP cleansing bullet, capable of breaching even the hardest of necronoid flesh and deals massive amounts of damage upon impact. This weapon is seen being used by the imperial necro hunters.

ThingDef.label: cleansing rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: A single use rocket launcher used to destroy fortified necronoid structures and boss-like necronoid entities. The rocket launcher fires a concentrated ANB nanite rockets in a single exchange, and can decimate anything under a 2.9 blast radius. The rocket launcher has a maximum number of 100 shots before it becomes un-usable.

ThingDef.label: imperial cleansing bolter machinegun
ThingDef.description: A special cleansing bolter machinegun designed for imperial use. Although slightly in-accurate, it can fire a barrage of cleansing bullets at long distances, perfect for providing suppressive fire.

ThingDef.label: cleansing shotgun
ThingDef.description: A KS 23 shotgun carbine that fires cleansing shotgun shells. Due to its rifled barrel, the cleansing shotgun can fire cleansing pellets at an incredible range, which is a stark contrast towards other shotguns out there. Though it possess a slow fire rate, each shot packs a lot of fire power coupled with a strong stopping power which is capable of nailing down fast moving opponents in its place. This shotgun also deals a monstrous damage againsts any necronoid entity, giving it a fitting title as "The Doom Giver".

ThingDef.label: boneshard rifle
ThingDef.description: A flesh rifle now repurposed for human use.

ThingDef.label: boneshard shotgun
ThingDef.description: A flesh shotgun now repurposed for human use.

ThingDef.label: advanced boneshard rifle
ThingDef.description: A flesh charge rifle now repurposed for human use.

ThingDef.label: boneshard avenger
ThingDef.description: A flesh minigun now repurposed for human use.

ThingDef.label: boneshard sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A flesh sniper rifle now repurposed for human use.
